product_name: Helly Hansen Kirkwall Rain Coat - Women's
long_description: The waterproof, windproof and stretchy Kirkwall Rain Coat for women from Helly Hansen offers a great retro design and is both stylish and practical on those blustery days by the water. Fully wind- and waterproof Helox+ fabric offers full stretch so you can reach with ease. Center front closes with snap buttons. Welded seams and welded-on hand pockets with protective flaps. Lined hood has cord ties. Venting on back enhances airflow for comfort. Helly Hansen Kirkwall Rain Coat for women features a regular fit and self-fabric belt.
short_description: The waterproof, windproof and stretchy Kirkwall Rain Coat for women from Helly Hansen offers a great retro design and is both stylish and practical on those blustery days by the water.
